fields.description: Map your CSV columns to system fields. Auto-mapping is applied based on header similarity.
fields.label: Field Mapping Configuration

fields.description: JSON mapping of CSV headers to system fields
fields.label: Field Mapping JSON
Download Options
fields.options:
Download Options:
• Use the Actions menu to download processed data
• Download field mapping template for reference
• Export validation results and error reports
